subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States national team celebrated U.S. Soccer’s 100th anniversary by breaking out of its offensive slump on Sunday, defeating Germany, 4-3, in an exhibition match.
snippet: The United States national team celebrated U.S. Soccer’s 100th anniversary by breaking out of its offensive slump on Sunday, defeating Germany, 4-3, in an exhibition match.
